title: Hot Collard Slaw
directions: In a small bowl, combine 3 tablespoons olive oil, vinegar, mustard, salt, pepper, and sugar and set aside. In a large saucepan over medium high heat, heat remaining olive oil.
Add garlic clove and the greens and sauté until tender–5 to 6 minutes. Add the vinegar mixture and toss to distribute evenly.
Transfer to a serving dish, top with bacon pieces, and serve immediately.
